name: obsidian-chameleon
description: Chameleon: A translation plugin for Obsidian that provides multilingual support.

scripts.build: npm run build:i18n && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-files
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.copy-files: mkdir dist && cp main.js dictionary.json manifest.json dist/
